For a decade now, we’ve defended DACA despite continuous efforts to displace #Dreamers. As we recognize the significance of this milestone, we also acknowledge the uncertainty and stress placed on individuals – like Jesus & Javier – and their families!

In 2006, Javier was reunited with his family when they moved to Breckenridge, Colorado. Javier started as a paralegal at CEO Attorneys after graduating from Colorado Mountain College. https://t.co/3w37Y9COiL

In 2008, Jesus and his family moved to Fort Collins, Colorado. Jesus is a field organizer at Conservation Colorado, an advocate for fellow DACA participants, and an exemplary student at Front Range Community College. https://t.co/Uu9dhwxLw5

Today, on the 10th Anniversary of #DACA, join me and the @HispanicCaucus in recognizing the vital contributions that #Dreamers and their families have made to our communities in Colorado and across the country. 🧵… https://t.co/mhfdsN0fPE
